course_title: Special Topics in Psychology: Neuroeconomics:Decision Making
seats: Seats: Maximum Enrollment: 30 / Seats Avail: 2Waitlist Total: 0
class_notes:
Same as NBB 370 2. Class meets online synchronous on Wed 4:00-6:45pm (EST) only.
Pre-requisites: Some coursework in Economics (Econ 201 & 212), Neuroscience (NBB 301 & 302) or Psychology ( PSYC 215, 217, 309, or 385) or consent of instructor.
course_description: A series of special topics of concern to the discipline of psychology. Content will vary in successive offerings. May be repeated for credit when topic varies.
